FieldDefinition.description: The Persistence Provider from which to retrieve connections
FieldDefinition.name: persistenceProviderName

Row.sql: INSERT INTO materialmaster (assemblyrelationship,assemblytype,defaultunit,description,enable,id,siteuid,source,version) VALUES ( NULL, NULL, [[defaultunit]], [[description]], [[enable]], [[id]], [[siteuid]], NULL, [[version]])

INSERT INTO workmaster (description,duration,durationunitofmeasure,id,longdescription,name,sequencenumber,siteuid,version,worktype) VALUES ( NULL, [[duration]], NULL, [[MaterialIDWithEquipment]], NULL, [[MaterialIDWithEquipment]], NULL, [[siteuid]], NULL, NULL)

UPDATE materialmaster SET assemblyrelationship = NULL, assemblytype = NULL, defaultunit = [[defaultunit]], description = [[description]], enable = [[enable]], id = [[id]], siteuid = [[siteuid]], source = NULL, version = [[version]]
WHERE uid = [[uid]];

UPDATE workmaster SET description = NULL, duration = [[duration]], durationunitofmeasure = NULL, longdescription = NULL, name = [[MaterialIDWithEquipment]], sequencenumber = NULL, siteuid = [[siteuid]], version = NULL, worktype = NULL
WHERE id = [[MaterialIDWithEquipment]]
UPDATE TWX_DPM_WorkMasterDetails SET Processed = 1 WHERE ID = [[ID]]
